<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2443</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">English Activities for the 5th grade</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Aktivitäten für den 5. Grad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Activités anglaises pour la 5ème catégorie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atividades inglesas para a ä classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attività inglesi per il quinto grado</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικές δραστηριότητες για την 5$η τάξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Actividades inglesas para el 5to grado</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of links to English Activities suited to 5th grade pupils , including language and grammar games, reading exercises and more.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">games</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spelling</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Links zu den englischen 
Aktivitäten entsprach zu den 5. Gradpupillen, einschließlich 
Sprachen- und Grammatikspiele und las Übungen und mehr.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de liens aux activités anglaises 
a convenu aux 5èmes pupilles de catégorie, y compris des jeux de 
langage et de grammaire, lisant des exercices et plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção das ligações às atividades 
inglesas serviu às äs pupilas da classe, including jogos da língua 
e da gramática, lendo exercícios e mais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di collegamenti alle attività 
inglesi ha soddisfatto alle quinto pupille del grado, compreso i 
giochi di grammatica e di linguaggio, leggendo le esercitazioni e 
più.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των συνδέσεων με τις αγγλικές 
δραστηριότητες ταιρίαξε στους 5$ους μαθητές βαθμού, 
συμπεριλαμβανομένων των παιχνιδιών γλώσσας και γραμματικής, 
διαβάζοντας τις ασκήσεις και περισσότερους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de conexiones a las actividades 
inglesas satisfizo a las 5tas pupilas del grado, incluyendo juegos del
lenguaje y de la gramática, leyendo ejercicios y más.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachenfähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesefähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rechtschreibung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">capacités linguistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeux</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">qualifications de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">épellation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεξιότητες ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ορθογραφία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">habilidades de lenguaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">juegos</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
